name: Silencer
summary: Silencer is an easy to learn action/strategy multiplayer side-scrolling platform game that emphasizes team play. Players control hackers on Mars called "Silencers", who are competing against each other to gain "secrets" by hacking military secrets. The first team to gain three "secrets" wins the mission. The losers are automatically identified and destroyed by the military. There are five Silencer Agencies vying for power, players chose one when they create a Silencer character.
